description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are the only spaceship left! It is up to you to defend against the ever growing hoard of evil shapes. Destroy more evil shapes to get more points, and buy better lasers! ~FULE Studios
